name: Pop Stream
description:
Turn Movie Night into Game Night
It’s not just a movie trivia app, and not just a board game. POP STREAM™ combines both into a team versus team trivia competition! Your tablet streams the big-screen scenes and trivia, while the interactive buzz-in game board (required; sold separately) brings the action into your home. POP STREAM™ can add “pop” to your next party!

Watch Real Movie Clips
Unlike other movie trivia board games, POP STREAM™ delivers clips, stills and posters from your favorite Hollywood movies. Watch and relive your favorite movie moments, then test yourself on your movie knowledge. You never know what movie will pop up next!

“Buzz-In” Team Action!
It’s easy to set up your tablet and game board (required; sold separately), just let the app guide you. And when you’re ready to play, the in-app Game Show Host does all the work: Playing the clips, reading the questions, and keeping score. All you have to do is guess the answers!

Put Yourself in the Game
With POP STREAM™, you don’t just play the game — you become part of it! Split into two teams, pick your team name (or let the game choose one for you), then take a selfie. Watch yourself and your teammates appear onscreen in your favorite movie scenes and stills!

Bet Big or Go Home
Hit the buzzer first, and your team gets to wager on an answer. Bet big if you’re sure you know the answer. If you guess wrong, the other team gets a shot at the question. Or you can pass the question to the other team, if you think they don’t know. But be careful! When you pass, the other team’s wager automatically doubles, so they could win big!



How Does It Work?
The app uses your tablet’s camera to “see” who buzzed in first, what they answered and how much they wagered. No batteries or Bluetooth required!


Prove Who’s the Biggest Movie Buff!
The Game Show Host keeps track of the score and declares the winner. It takes fast
hands, a sharp eye, and a cool head to win! POP STREAM™ is intended for two to eight players (in two teams). POP STREAM™ includes content from PG-13 and R-rated movies and is intended to be played by Adults.


What Do I Need to Play?
To use the POP STREAM™ app, you’ll need to purchase the POP STREAM™ board game (sold separately at most mass retailers and online). It comes with the interactive “Buzz-In” game board, a cradle to hold your tablet (tablet not included), six betting tokens, and instructions. A Wi-Fi connection is required during game play and for the app download and updates. (Data charges may apply).
